title: Dune Analytics Skills Configuration
description: Configuration for Dune Analytics skills to fetch data from Dune Analytics API.

fetch_nation_metrics.title: Fetch Crestal Nation Metrics
fetch_nation_metrics.description: Fetches Crestal Nation metrics (e.g., total_users, agents/citizens, market_cap) from Dune Analytics API.

fetch_kol_buys.title: Fetch KOL Memecoin Buys
fetch_kol_buys.description: Fetches a list of KOL memecoin buy transactions on Solana from Dune Analytics API using query ID 4832844.
